body.p: This documentation is intended to be an introduction to the concepts behind the Apache James Server usage, as well as a guide to install, configure , manage, monitor and develop Apache James Server.
Download Apache James Mail Server 3.8.0 and quick-start it!
You can also have a look to the last stable version

Apache James Server 3.8.0 represents the leading edge of development. This code stream has many more features than the 2.3 code, but is not be as well tested in production. Reasonable configuration compatibility has been retained with 2.3.2.

Apache James Server 3.8.0 and following versions require Java 1.11. A migration guide for users willing to upgrade from 2.3 to 3.8.0 is available. If relying on Guice wiring, you can use some additional components (Cassandra, OpenSearch, ...).
